com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

Class Facet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Facet.DateRangeFacet, Facet.IntervalFacet, Facet.NumericRangeFacet, Facet.PivotFacet, Facet.QueryFacet, Facet.StatsFacet, Facet.SubdocumentFacet, Facet.TermFacet, Facet.TypeFacet

    public abstract class Facet
extends Object
    Abstract class to be implemented by the specific facet query classes Facet.TermFacet, Facet.NumericRangeFacet, Facet.DateRangeFacet, Facet.PivotFacet, Facet.QueryFacet and Facet.StatsFacet.
    Since:
    27.06.16.
    Author:
    Thomas Kurz (tkurz@apache.org), Alfonso Noriega Meneses

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Facet.DateIntervalFacet<T> 
      static class  Facet.DateRangeFacet<T>
      This abstract class provides the foundations to be implemented by date type specific classes in order to perform ranged facet query on a date field.
      static class  Facet.IntervalFacet<T> 
      static class  Facet.NumericIntervalFacet<T extends Number> 
      static class  Facet.NumericRangeFacet<T extends Number>
      This class allows to perform ranged facet query on a numeric field.
      static class  Facet.PivotFacet
      Allows to configure basic pivot facet queries on a group of fields.
      static class  Facet.QueryFacet
      Allows to configure a query facet.
      static class  Facet.StatsDateFacet<T extends ZonedDateTime>
      Allows to configure a date stats facet query.
      static class  Facet.StatsFacet<T>
      Allows to configure a basic stats facet query.
      static class  Facet.StatsNumericFacet<T extends Number>
      Allows to configure a numeric stats facet query.
      static class  Facet.StatsUtilDateFacet<T extends Date>
      Allows to configure a date stats facet query.
      static class  Facet.SubdocumentFacet
      This class allows to perform a subdocument faceting based on document type.
      static class  Facet.TermFacet<T>
      This class allows to perform the basic term facet query on one field.
      static class  Facet.TypeFacet
      This class allows to perform a basic faceting based on document type.
